ygData.subject: Argh... I lost the Dwarven Ringmail Tunic
ygData.msgSnippet: was transferring armor and stuff from Einan to Febon, accidentally drop the tunic and i didnt notice. went off to do the transferring in private and couldnt
ygData.messageBody:
was transferring armor and stuff from Einan to Febon,
accidentally drop the tunic and i didnt notice.

went off to do the transferring in private and couldnt find the tunic,
went back to bank and saw a lvl 8 warrior wearring one(he didnt
have one before), told me he bought it for 10 gp and when i told
him it might be mine , he said he bought it 4 days ago.

Sorry , very sorry , will try to get one back as soon as possible.

Einan aka Febon
